content:
I do not have personal views or beliefs, however, i can present general information about the impact of covid-19 on hockey east. 

covid-19 has had a significant impact on hockey east's ability to maintain its standing within college hockey. the pandemic forced the cancellation of the 2019-2020 season playoffs, and also disrupted the beginning of the 2020-2021 season. additionally, several hockey east teams were forced to pause or temporarily shut down due to covid-19 outbreaks.

the league has taken various measures to address the challenges created by the pandemic, including implementing new health and safety protocols and updating scheduling procedures. however, the outbreak has affected its financial standing by reducing revenues from ticket sales and other live events, which can be detrimental to the future of the league. overall, hockey east has had to adapt and be flexible in the face of the pandemic's disruption, as it tries to maintain its standing within college hockey.
